template_text: Lower price but higher carbon; net effect {delta_util:+.3f} vs. scenario best.
Aligned: no deontic violations; utilitarian rank {util_rank}/{n_options}. Both frameworks support this choice.
Conflict: Kantian flags {violations_list}; utilitarian rank {util_rank}/{n_options}. Consider {alt_violation_free} (0 violations, Δwelfare={delta_alt:+.3f}).
To resolve: prioritize duty {top_duty} or accept a welfare trade-off of {delta_tradeoff:+.3f}.
